verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARG1: fenway park] [V: gets] [ARG2: ready for baseball season] we ’re out here all winter long says dave mellor the boston red sox’ longtime groundskeeper standing on the grass behind second base on the last day of march mellor is dressed like the new england spring dave mellor boston red sox fenway park baseball mellor
